welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Abbeville, where history, nature, and Southern hospitality come together. Explore our quaint town and enjoy the beauty it has to offer. We are excited to have you here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Acadiana Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Acadiana Regional Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lafayette Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lafayette Regional Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
